ques_ne: के तपाईंले कोभिड-१९ महामारीको कारण आफ्नो व्यवसाय बन्द गर्नु पर्यो ?
ques_en: Did you have to stop your business due to COVID-19 pandemic?

ques_ne: कति समय सम्म तपाईंले आफ्नो व्यापार बन्द गर्नु पर्यो ?
ques_en: For how long did you have to stop your business?

ques_ne: महामारीको क्रममा यी मध्ये कुन कारकले तपाईको व्यवसाय अपरेसनलाई असर गर्यो?
ques_en: Which of the following factors affected your business operations during the pandemic?

ques_en: Specify other

ques_ne: तलका मध्ये कुन कुन कारकले तपाईको व्यवसायलाई सब भन्दा बढी प्रभावित गर्यो?
ques_en: Among the following, which factor affected your business the most?

ques_ne: तलका मध्ये कुन कुन कारकले तपाईको व्यवसायलाई सब भन्दा बढी प्रभावित गर्यो?
ques_en: Among the following, which factor affected your business the most?

ques_ne: तलका मध्ये कुन कुन कारकले तपाईको व्यवसायलाई सब भन्दा बढी प्रभावित गर्यो?
ques_en: Among the following, which factor affected your business the most?

ques_ne: महामारीको कारणले तलका मध्ये कुन कार्यबल सम्बन्धित कार्य तपाईंको व्यापारले गरेको छ ?
ques_en: Which of the following workforce-related actions did your business take due to the pandemic?

ques_ne: तपाईंको व्यवसाय ले अरु कुन कार्य (हरू) गर्यो ?
ques_en: What other action(s) did your business take?

ques_en: Which of the following loan related impacts did your business have to face due to the pandemic?

ques_en: Which of the following assets related impacts did your business have to face due to the pandemic?

ques_en: Which of the following costs related impacts did your business have to face due to the pandemic?

ques_en: Specify other

ques_en: Which of the following location related impacts did your business have to face due to the pandemic?

ques_en: Which of the following equity and ownership related impacts did your business have to face due to the pandemic?

ques_en: Specify other

ques_ne: के कुनै अन्य वित्तीय प्रभावहरू रहेका छन ?
ques_en: Were there any other financial impacts?

ques_ne: अन्य वित्तीय प्रभावहरू के के रहेका छन् ?
ques_en: What were other financial impacts?

ques_ne: महामारी भन्दा पहिले तपाईको व्यवसायले कति जनालाई रोजगार दिने गर्थ्यो ?
ques_en: How many people did your business employ before the pandemic?

ques_en: Compared to 2019, how has the size of your workforce changed in 2020?

ques_ne: २०१९को तुलानामा महमारिको कारणले २०२० मा तपाईंको व्यापार राजस्वमा परिवर्तन भएको छ ?
ques_en: Compared to 2019, how have your business revenues changed in 2020?

ques_ne: २०१९को तुलानामा महमारिको कारणले २०२० मा तपाईंको व्यवसायको बचतमा परिवर्तन भएको छ ?
ques_en: Compared to 2019, how has your business’s savings changed in 2020?

ques_ne: तपाईंको व्यवसायले महामारीको अगाडि कुन सेवाहरू प्रदान गर्थ्यो?
ques_en: Which services did your business offer before the pandemic?

ques_ne: तपाईंको व्यवसायले महामारीको अगाडि प्रदान गर्ने अन्य सेवाहरू तोक्नुहोस्?
ques_en: Specify other services your business offered before the pandemic

ques_ne: तपाईंको व्यवसायले महामारीको पछि प्रदान गर्ने अन्य सेवाहरू तोक्नुहोस्?
ques_en: Specify other services your business will offer after the pandemic

ques_ne: स्वास्थ्य र सरसफाईसँग सम्बन्धित कुन उपायहरू तपाईंको व्यवसायले महामारीको बखत प्रयोग गर्यो?
ques_en: Which of the following health and sanitation related measures did your business employ during the pandemic?

ques_ne: तपाईंको व्यवसायले महामारीको बखत अन्य के कस्तो उपायहरु प्रयोग गर्यो?
ques_en: What other measure did your business employ in response to COVID-19?

ques_ne: कामदारहरूको लागि हाल के कस्तो सुरक्षा उपायहरू रहेका छन् ?
ques_en: What are some safety measures for workers that are currently in place?

ques_en: Other safety measures for workers

ques_ne: निम्न रणनीतिक कार्यहरू मध्ये कुन तपाईंको व्यवसायमा हाल महामारीको लागि एक प्रतिक्रियाको रूपमा उपक्रम (वा योजना) हो?
ques_en: Which of the following strategic actions is your business currently undertaking (or planning to undertake) as a response to the pandemic?

ques_en: What strategic actions is your business currently undertaking (or planning to undertake) with the external stakeholders as a response to the pandemic?

ques_ne: कृपया अन्य रणनीतिक कार्य निर्दिष्ट गर्नुहोस्
ques_en: Please specify other strategic action

ques_en: Does your business have a dedicated COVID-19 desk or personnel?

ques_ne: सरकारबाट कस्तो किसिमको नीति स्तर समर्थन तपाईंको व्यवसायको लागि सब भन्दा बढी सहयोगी हुन सक्छ?
ques_en: What kind of policy level support from the government would be most helpful to your business?

ques_ne: अन्य समर्थन नीति निर्दिष्ट गर्नुहोस्
ques_en: Specify other support policy

ques_ne: आउँदो छ महिना भित्र, निम्न मध्ये कुन समस्या तपाईंको व्यवसायले सामना गर्नेछ?
ques_en: Within the next six months, which of the following problems will your business face?

ques_ne: निम्न मध्ये कुन ऋण रकम फिर्ता सम्बन्धीत सहयोग तपाईंलाई सबैभन्दा बढी मद्दत पुर्याउँछ?

ques_en: Which of the following labor-related assistance will be most helpful to you?

ques_ne: निम्न मध्ये कुन व्यापार आउटरीच सम्बन्धित सहयोग तपाईलाई सब भन्दा बढी सहयोगी हुनेछ?
ques_en: Which of the following business outreach-related assistance will be most helpful to you?

ques_ne: पर्यटन व्यवसायको पुनरुद्धारका लागि सरकारले विभिन्न योजनाको घोषणा गरेको छ। के तपाईंले यस्ता कुनै योजनाहरू प्रयोग गर्नुभयो?

ques_ne: निम्न मध्ये कुन २०२१ मा तपाईंको सबैभन्दा ठूलो कठिनाइ हुन सक्छ?

ques_en: Among the difficulties you have chosen, which of these difficulties is likely to be most serious for your business?

ques_ne: तपाईले छनौट गरेका कठिनाइहरूका बीच यी मध्ये कुन कठिनाइ तपाईंको व्यवसायको लागि सबैभन्दा गम्भीर हुन सक्छ?
ques_en: Among the difficulties you have chosen, which of these difficulties is likely to be most serious for your business?

ques_ne: तपाईको व्यवसायको लागी सब भन्दा ठूलो सहयोगी को हुनसक्छ ?
